en.slogan: Hard work may lie, but hard work will not be wasted.
en.aboutMe:
I was engaged as a full-stack engineer for over 2.5+ years and one year as front-end engineer. I am better at front-end skills, particularly restoring design layout.
I am interested in learning new skills which make me feel challenged and have a sense of accomplishment.

zh-TW.aboutMe:
我是Lucy，一名有四年左右的程式開發經驗的前端工程師，⼤概三年左右的全端，近一年則專注於前端開發，技能⽐較偏向前端⽅⾯，但不排斥寫⼀點後端。
因為有後端開發的經驗，所以可以更好的跟後端合作，並協助處理一些後端的問題。
不怕解決問題，因為更喜歡解決問題時的成就感。
